author: CNET
description:
It's the season for writing wish lists, so here's one for Apple CEO Tim Cook. CNET’s Bridget Carey gives her wish list for what products and updates could be really exciting for Apple to release — and they aren’t that hard to pull off!

You can find the products mentioned in this video linked below
iPhone 17 Pro https://zdcs.link/z7MedG
Apple Watch Series 11 https://zdcs.link/921YAE
AirPods Pro 3 https://zdcs.link/QOglvn

00:00 The Tech Industry's Lost Focus
00:24 A Wishlist for Tim Cook
00:42 Future of Apple Leadership
00:57 More Color for High-End Products
01:51 Real-Life Activity Tracking for Apple Watch
02:46 Bring Back the iPhone Mini!
03:28 Face ID for the MacBook
03:48 Improving Siri and Apple Intelligence
04:31 Closing Thoughts

title: Dear, Apple: Please Make These Products!
